sentences.sContent: His regime was tarnished by human rights abuses.
sentences.sCn: 他的政权因践踏人权而形象受损。

synos.tran: 玷污；使……失去光泽；使……变灰暗

trans.tranOther: dullness of colour, or loss of brightness

trans.tranCn: 玷污；使……失去光泽；使……变灰暗
trans.tranOther: if an event or fact tarnishes someone’s  reputation  , record, image etc, it makes it worse
